etymology.description: 行動(行動) (xíngdòng, "action; movement") + 電源(電源) (diànyuán, "power source") = power source for movement -> power bank
etymology.interpretation: The term 行動電源(行動電源) (xíngdòngdiànyuán, "power bank") makes sense as it literally describes a portable power source that facilitates movement or action, which is essential for charging devices on the go. This combination reflects the practical use of a power bank in ensuring devices remain powered while being mobile.

examples.chinese: 我买了一个行动电源(我買了一個行動電源)。
在旅行时(在旅行時)，行动电源很方便(行動電源很方便)。
examples.pinyin: Zài lǚxíng shí, xíngdòngdiànyuán hěn fāngbiàn.
examples.english: When traveling, the power bank is very convenient.

examples.chinese: 他推荐购买行动电源(他推薦購買行動電源)。
examples.english: He recommended buying a power bank.
